EmailTemplate.name: 202007_Americas_GDT_Sell-More_less-than-5-minutes-to-launch_email.Subject Line T
EmailTemplate.subject: An Online Parts Storefront In <5 Minutes? Yes, Please.
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
As the world evolves in reaction to recent events, so do we as buyers and sellers in the used serviceable aero market. Buying will become more digital and online, migrating away from traditional face to face meetings, phone calls, and email RFQs.
Our sellers <[[https://www.godirecttrade.com/storefront?utm_source=email&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=Buy_More]]> are open online 24 hours a day, 7 days a week on GoDirect Trade <[[http://www.godirecttrade.com/]]> with full price transparency on over two billion dollars’ worth of inventory, on the shelf and ready to ship.
We’ve taken the hassle out of selling and sellers can launch their storefront and load their first listings in less than five minutes:
- Click on Launch A Storefront below. - You will be guided to complete three easy steps (~5 minutes to complete). Your free 6-month subscription does not require a credit card. - Watch your customer base grow and the orders come in.
GoDirect Trade is the aerospace marketplace of the future. It has been featured in Forbes <[[https://www.forbes.com/sites/moorinsights/2020/01/29/honeywell-demonstrates-that-its-an-iiot-not-just-an-ot-company/#3e7c44d768e9]]>, The Wall Street Journal <[[https://www.wsj.com/articles/honeywell-brings-blockchain-to-used-aircraft-parts-market-11559072819]]> and Harvard Business Review <[[https://www.tcs.com/content/dam/tcs/pdf/Industries/manufacturing/abstract/HBR-TCS-WP-Nov-2019.pdf]]> and is rapidly moving from “small startup” to “major disruptor.”
Zero upfront costs to start selling online today. LAUNCH A STOREFRONT <[[https://www.godirecttrade.com/customer/oauth/login/user_type/customer/deeplink/bWFya2V0cGxhY2UvYWNjb3VudC9lZGl0UHJvZmlsZS8=]]> Stay healthy, stay safe, and take care,
Lisa Butters General Manager GoDirectTrade.com <[[https://www.godirecttrade.com/?utm_source=email&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=User_Growth]]> (powered by Honeywell)
